actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to provide for the addition of the Truman Farm Home to the Harry S. Truman Historic National Site in the State of Missouri, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends Federal law to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to acquire the Truman Farm Home in Grandview, Jackson County, Missouri, to add to the Harry S. Truman National Historic Site.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the addition of the Truman Farm Home to the Harry S. Truman Historic National Site in the State of Missouri, and for other purposes.
